sourcesContent:
<template>
  <textarea
    v-if="type === 'textarea'"
    :name="name"
    :id="id"
    :value="value"
    :placeholder="placeholder"
    @input="handleInput"
    :required="required"
  ></textarea>
  <input
    v-else
    :type="type"
    :name="name"
    :id="id"
    :value="value"
    :placeholder="placeholder"
    :required="required"
    @input="handleInput"
  />
</template>

<script>
import formInputMixin from '@/mixins/form-input.mixin';

export default {
  mixins: [formInputMixin],
  props: {
    type: {
      type: String,
      default: 'text'
    },
    placeholder: {
      type: String
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
input {
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  border: var(--border-width-default) solid;
  border-color: var(--border-input-normal);
  padding: var(--element-padding-s);
  font-family: 'OpenSans-Regular';
  font-size: var(--size-regular);
  color: var(--color-main-900);
  transition: var(--transition-default);
  margin: var(--element-margin-xs) 0;

  &:hover {
    border-color: var(--border-input-hover);
  }
  &:focus {
    border-color: var(--border-input-active);
    outline: none;
  }
}
</style>
